title: The Matrix
description: A computer programmer discovers reality is a simulation and joins a rebellion to free humanity from machine control.

title: Dangal
description: A former wrestler trains his daughters to become world-class wrestlers despite societal opposition.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: The Avengers assemble once more to reverse the damage caused by Thanos and restore balance to the universe.

title: 3 Idiots
description: Three friends embark on a journey to find their missing friend and learn valuable lessons about life and education.

title: Parasite
description: A poor family infiltrates the lives of a wealthy family, leading to unexpected consequences.
